name: twirpscript-development
description: Protobuf RPC framework for JavaScript and TypeScript
author: Tate Thurston <tatethurston@gmail.com>

scripts.check:all: npm run examples:check && npm run test
scripts.examples:check: for example in $(ls examples | grep -v buf); do (cd examples/"$example" && npm run twirpscript && tsc --noEmit) || exit 1; done
scripts.examples:setup: for example in examples/*; do (cd $example && npm link twirpscript); done
scripts.package:build: npm install && npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:module && chmod +x dist/compiler.js dist/cli/index.js && cp src/compiler.cmd dist/compiler.cmd && npm run package:prune && npm run package:copy:files
scripts.regen: npm run test:integration && npm run test -u && npm run examples:check && npm run examples:buf
scripts.test-protos: (cd src/integration-tests/protos && npm run build && npm run typecheck:protos)
scripts.test:integration: npm run test-serialization && npm run test-protos && npm run test-clientcompat
